title: Percentage Calculator

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: Select the calculation mode you need
howToUse.step2: Enter your values in the input fields
howToUse.step4: Copy the result or try another calculation

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I calculate a percentage of a number?
faq.a1: To find X% of Y, multiply Y by X and divide by 100. For example, 20% of 150 = (150 × 20) ÷ 100 = 30.
faq.q2: How do I find what percent one number is of another?
faq.a2: Divide the first number by the second and multiply by 100. For example, 25 is what % of 50? (25 ÷ 50) × 100 = 50%.
faq.q3: How do I calculate percentage increase or decrease?
faq.a3: Subtract the old value from the new value, divide by the old value, and multiply by 100. A positive result is an increase, negative is a decrease.
